name: Flygon LV.X
author: Shizurow

poke_body.name: Wind Erosion
poke_body.effect: As long as Flygon is your Active Pokémon, discard the top card from your opponent’s deck between turns.

attacks.name: Extreme Attack
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon LV.X. This attack does 150 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon).

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Flygon. Flygon LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
